Market Focus

Agriculture

Our crop protection, fertilizer and animal health services provide vital global market intelligence and analysis

Fibre

Supporting the global industry  for fibres including cotton, hemp, flax and more essential materials

Food

Essential news and insights for anyone in the food industry, covering crops, harvests, markets, imports, and exports

Energy

Whether in Oil & Gas, Mining, or Petrochemical, your focus is on mitigating risks, effective investment and commissioning of assets

Renewable Fuels

Focus on the global renewable energies market, providing reports and analysis on solar energy, wind energy, and energy efficiency

Feedstocks

Reports on the basic materials used to produce goods or intermediate materials which are feedstock for future finished products

Transportation

The transportation & logistics industry forms the backbone of modern global supply chains

By-products / co-products

Co-products are desirable secondary goods that are generated during the manufacturing process

How we've helped other businesses

We asked Informa to help us understand the global viewpoint on feedstuffs movements and logistics. With Issue Monitor, we get all of that information in one place.
John Smith Senior Vice President at HBS Food
View Case Study
